title: Geoff Culbert - Business Council of Australia
snippet: Geoff assumed the role of President of the Business Council of Australia in February 2024. Geoff is Chair of the NSW Fundraising Committee for the Australian Olympic Committee.

title: Business Council of Australia proposes five critical questions for the next Australian government - AICD
snippet: Former Sydney Airport CEO Geoff Culbert became president of the Business Council of Australia (BCA) in February 2024, when CEO Bran Black, a lawyer and former government adviser, was just six months into his new role at the powerful advocacy group.
